id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this TB6612FNG component.

*See also: [Grove TB6612FNG Motor Drive](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x14`.

*See also: [Grove TB6612FNG Motor Drive](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#configuration-variables)*

name.docs:
**boolean**: The name of the component

*See also: [Grove TB6612FNG Motor Drive](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#configuration-variables)*

run.docs:
Set the motor to spin by defining the direction and speed of the rotation, speed is a range from 0 to 255

*See also: [`grove_tb6612fng.run` Action](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#grove-tb6612fng-run-action)*

break.docs:
Set the motor channel to be on break mode which it ensure the wheel wont spin even if forced or pushed

*See also: [`grove_tb6612fng.break` Action](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#grove-tb6612fng-break-action)*

stop.docs:
Set the motor to stop motion but wont stop to spin in case there is a force pulling down, you would want to use break action if this is your case

*See also: [`grove_tb6612fng.stop` Action](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#grove-tb6612fng-stop-action)*

standby.docs:
Set the board to be on standby when is not used for a long time which reduces power consumptions and any jerking motion when stationary

*See also: [`grove_tb6612fng.standby` Action](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#grove-tb6612fng-standby-action)*

no_standby.docs:
Set the board to be awake, every esphome is restarted the default mode is set to standby to ensure the motor wont spin accidentally

*See also: [`grove_tb6612fng.no_standby` Action](https://esphome.io/components/grove_tb6612fng.html#grove-tb6612fng-no-standby-action)*
